General.Name: Diversified Gateway Solutions Bhd
General.Description: Divfex Berhad, an investment holding company, provides digital, infrastructure, and integration services for telecommunications, enterprise, and media networks in Malaysia. The company provides a range of tele/data communication, computer networking, and digital media solutions and services; and industrial automation and related services, as well as distributes and resells hardware and software. In addition, it offers digital media solutions and services; sale of consumable goods; computer distribution, network security, and storage and network management solutions; and provision of technology solutions for food and related industries. The company also engages in telecommunication services, and solutions and consultancy business; and offers actionable insights of solution design, assessment, and recommendation of information technology infrastructure; and managed technology and performance optimization services. It has strategic partnerships with Ciena, Cisco, Huawei, Juniper, and Extreme Networks. The company was formerly known as Diversified Gateway Solutions Berhad and changed its name to Divfex Berhad in April 2022. Divfex Berhad was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Shah Alam, Malaysia.
